posts.description:
Jacob Arabo @jacobandco never disappoints. This year at #Baselworld he presented an extraordinary #necklace that featured a 20.60cts marquise cut yellow diamond, 3.77cts pear shape purplish pink #diamond and a pear shaped diamond over 30 carats. The three gems were held together by a string of emerald beads.  Photo credit: Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom 
#finejewellery #highjewellery #highjewelry #altagioielleria #altajoyeria #altajoalheria #hautejoaillerie #jacobandcoonkaterinaperezcom #ichoosefinejewellery #pinkdiamond #diamond #yellowdiamond
posts.localization: Baselworld - The Watch and Jewellery Show

posts.description:
This Swinging necklace is a sparkling masterpiece from the new @messikajewelry #highjewellry collection "Paris est une fête". It features 127 oval cut diamonds with the total weight of more than 35 cts.
Photo credit: Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom 
#finejewellery #highjewellery #highjewelry #altagioielleria #altajoyeria #altajoalheria #hautejoaillerie #messikaonkaterinaperezcom #ichoosefinejewellery #Messikajewelry #baselworld2017

posts.description: How sweet is this #Mikimoto @official_mikimoto #chocker discovered at #baselworld2017? Pearls are so not just grandmother's #jewellery any longer!  Photo credit: Simon @Martner for #katerinaperezcom #mikimotoonkaterinaperezcom #preciousjewels #finejewellery #highjewellery #pearlnecklace #pearljewellery

posts.description:
PREMIÈRE CAMÉLIA SKELETON WATCH by #Chanel presented at #Baselworld2017. Crafted in
white gold, brilliant cut and baguette cut diamonds it features a signature camellia movement set with diamonds called the Calibre 2. It is the second exclusive movement designed and manufactured by CHANEL's Swiss Manufacture. Boasting rare purity, its design featuring stacked discs depicts the natural geometric outline of the camellia. An exceptional calibre that pushes the boundaries of fine watchmaking for women with elegance and virtuosity.
Photo by Simon @martner for #katerinaperezcom.
 #watch #timepiece #jewellerywatch #highwatchmaking #hautehorlogerie #jewelledtimepiece #chanelonkaterinaperezcom
posts.localization: Baselworld - The Watch and Jewellery Show

posts.description:
Remember last year @degrisogono introduced Ventaglio collection during Basel that was inspired by the motif of a fan? This year Fawaz Gruozi introduced a continuation of it in a form of rings and bracelets.
Photo by Simon @martner for #katerinaperezcom.

#finejewellery #highjewellery #highjewelry #altagioielleria #altajoyeria #altajoalheria #hautejoaillerie #diamonds #degrisogonoonkaterinaperezcom #ichoosefinejewellery
posts.localization: Baselworld - The Watch and Jewellery Show

posts.description:
This L’Anfiteatro #ring was made by @picchiotti_fine_jewellery especially to mark a significant round date - the 50th anniversary of the Italian company. This jewel is featured on the cover of “The First Fifty Year” book, written by jewellery historian Vivienne Becker. In one chapter she writes: “The 50th anniversary ring, exuberant, exciting yet sublimely elegant, is, Giuseppe feels, the most spectacular illustration of Picchiotti’s refined, rarefied hand-craftsmanship. Inspired by a classical amphitheater, the soaring shape of the three fan elements lined with baguette diamonds evokes the image of rows of seats overlooking the central stage, in which stands the leading actor, the protagonist – in this case a breathtakingly beautiful ruby of 8.05 Carats.” - Read the whole article at: http://www.katerinaperez.com/2017/04/13/p-50th-anniversary/
Photo by Simon @martner for #katerinaperezcom 
#highjewellery #finejewellery #ichoosefinejewellery #hautejoaillerie #baselworld2017 #luxury #luxuryjewellery #highjewelry #jewellery 
#jewelleryart #artjewellery #rubyring
posts.localization: Baselworld - The Watch and Jewellery Show

posts.description:
How absolutely exquisite are these Gondola #earrings from the latest collection of @alessio_boschi_jewels. This uber talented Italian designer never ceases to amaze! 
The earrings are made of 18K white gold and embellished with a marquise cut #tanzanite, #emeralds and# diamonds.
Photographed by Simon @martner for #katerinaperezcom.
#uniquejewellery #diamondjewellery 
#highjewellery #finejewellery #ichoosefinejewellery #hautejoaillerie #baselworld2017 #luxuryjewellery #highjewelry #luxury #unique #alessioboschionkaterinaperezcom

posts.description:
Very often I cannot help thinking of delicious sweets when I see jewellery with #cabochon #gemstones. Please tell me it's not just me :)
One-of-a-kind #ruby ring with #diamonds by @houseoftabbah
Photo by Simon @martner who knows how to make jewellery look YUMMY in the photo.

#finejewellery #highjewellery #highjewelry #cabochonruby #hautejoaillerie #houseoftabbahonkaterinaperezcom #houseoftabbah

Every year on this day I celebrate my birthday - like I did in this photo aged 3. This old photo is my answer to those of you who want to know where my love for jewellery comes from :) - I was born with it!
#katerinaperez #happybirthdaytome #birthdaygirl

How gorgeous is @chantecler_official #emerald #ring photographed by @martner at #baselworld2017. I still don't know how Simon did it with just a camera of his and a flash. Beautiful photo, beautiful #jewel.
#highjewellery #finejewellery #jewellery #altagioielleria #chantecler #chantecleronkaterinaperezcom #emeraldring #hautejoaillerie

posts.description:
Feast your eyes on these gorgeous chandelier #earrings by @busattimilano. They are made in titanium that is a very light metal, and encrusted with #rubies and #diamonds.
Photographed by @martner at #baselworld2017.

posts.description:
If you appreciate #conch pearls, you will appreciate this exquisite Persica #necklace by @sarahhojewellery. It features unusual triangular conch #pearls that had been collected one by one over the period of a few years.
Read the interview with Sarah Ho on my website.
http://www.katerinaperez.com/2017/04/22/sarah-ho-high-jewellery/
#sarahhoonkaterinaperezcom #conchpearl #conchpearls #highjewelry #highjewellery #hautejoaillerie #pearljewellery #sarahho #luxuryjewellery #preciousjewellery #ichoosefinejewellery
